semantic_identifier: 118: feat: Issue Prioritization v2: scoring profile picker + weight tuning UI with live per-dimension/aggregate scoring

sections.text:
## Description

Implements the Issue Prioritization v2 frontend experience for selecting and tuning scoring profiles.

Key changes
- Adds a scoring profile selector (org/user profiles) with default behavior that matches the existing single-score logic when no profile is selected.
- Introduces per-dimension tuning controls (Support SLA risk, Product impact, Sales deal blockers) to adjust weights for the active profile.
- Displays per-dimension scores and the aggregated score in both Issue List and Issue Detail views, recalculating based on the active profile/weights.

API wiring (GOLD-166)
- Integrates with saved profiles APIs:
  - list profiles on load/open of the selector
  - apply selected profile to become the active context
  - update profile weights when tuning controls are saved
- Ensures UI state stays in sync with the active profile returned by the backend and refreshes issue scoring accordingly.

Implementation notes
- Adds a shared scoring-profile state/provider to avoid duplicate fetching and to propagate the active profile across list/detail routes.
- Updates issue fetching/rendering to include and display dimension breakdown + aggregate for the active profile.
- Handles loading/error states for profile list/apply/update and keeps the last-known active profile visible to prevent UI flicker.

User impact
- Users can switch between scoring profiles and tune weights, immediately changing how issues are prioritized and displayed in list/detail views.

## How Has This Been Tested?
